name: EventHubs
description: Azure function for reading data from EventHub and then forward it to Sumo collector HTTP endpoint.

scripts.build: cp index.js ../target/logs_build/EventHubs_Logs/ && cp index_metrics.js ../target/metrics_build/EventHubs_Metrics/index.js && cp ../../sumo-function-utils/lib/*.js ../target/logs_build/EventHubs_Logs/ && cp ../../sumo-function-utils/lib/*.js ../target/metrics_build/EventHubs_Metrics/

author: Himanshu Pal
